Articles.Content: Just checking how many KSP users play Eve Online, post up here if you do If you don\'t and like both space ships and explosions go check it out. Fly safe.

I have a trial account.

Went to download, found it it needs 8GBs.
i am a capsuler have been playing for about 6 months now
i DID play eve but i realised that it a load of crap in which CCP are leeching money from very few people and betrayal is infinitely too common
